title: Submission of Gazette Notifications in Parliament for approval
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Minister of Finance to submit Orders published under the following Gazette Notifications in Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.

i	The following Gazette Notifications issued under the Airports 	Development Levy 	Act, No. 18 of 2011

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2216/3 dated 2021‑02‑22

 	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2218/51 dated 2021‑03‑09

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2219/68 dated 2021‑03‑19

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2224/8 dated 2021‑04‑19

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2231/19 dated 2021‑06‑11

ii	The following Gazette Notifications issued under the Excise (Special 	Provisions) Act, No. 13 of 1989

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2222/2 dated 2021‑04‑05

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2222/3 dated 2021‑04‑05

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2224/24 dated 2021‑04‑22

iii	The following Gazette Notifications issued under the Special 	Commodity Levy Act, No. 48 of 2007

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2223/2 dated 2021‑04‑13

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2225/1 dated 2021‑04‑26

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2225/8 dated 2021‑04‑27

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2225/13 dated 2021‑04‑27

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2228/3 dated 2021‑05‑17

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2232/3 dated 2021‑06‑14

iv	The following Gazette Notifications issued under the Revenue 	Protection Act, No. 19 of 1962

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2224/25 dated 2021‑04‑22

	*	Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2228/2 dated 2021‑05‑17.
